title: New: Little Big Sea – Portugal
body: Perfect evening dreamy vibes from Vienna trio, **Little Big Sea** on their new offering _Portugal_. Arriving with a three track EP, complete with a trio of remixes, standout track Portugal is a slice of heavenly, glistening London Grammar / Daughter-esque pop. Check out Portugal and Saturday below and grab the full EP from their [Bandcamp](https://littlebigsea.bandcamp.com/). Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly. Portugal by Litte Big Sea
